meta.title: "A mathematician is a device for turning

body.text:
"A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems" -- P. Erdos
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "A witty saying proves nothing." --

body.text:
"A witty saying proves nothing." -- Voltaire
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
"Arguing with nyh just doesn't pay off." -- Muli Ben-Yehuda, Linux-il list

meta.title: "Computers are useless. They can only

body.text:
"Computers are useless. They can only give you answers." -- Pablo Picasso

body.text:
"Did you sleep well?" "No, I made a couple of mistakes."
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
"Do you want to restart Windows now or wait for the next crash?"
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
"God is dead." - Nietzsche; "Nietzsche is dead" - God
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "How could we possibly use sex to get

body.text:
"How could we possibly use sex to get what we want? Sex IS what we want!" Fraser
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "I don't use drugs, my dreams are

body.text:
"I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough." -- M. C. Escher
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "I'll doublecross that bridge when I come

body.text:
"I'll doublecross that bridge when I come to it" (a politician about the future)
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "Luck is when preparation meets

body.text:
"Luck is when preparation meets opportunity." - Richard Sherman
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "Mommy! The garbage man is here!" "Well,

body.text:
"Mommy! The garbage man is here!" "Well, tell him we don't want any!"- Groucho Marx
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "Never be afraid to tell the world who

body.text:
"Never be afraid to tell the world who you are." -- Anonymous
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "Outlook not so good." Wow! That magic 8-

body.text:
"Outlook not so good." Wow! That magic 8- ball knows everything! So, what about IE?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "There is no system but GNU, and Linux is

body.text:
"There is no system but GNU, and Linux is one of its kernels" -- Richard Stallman
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: "[I'm] so full of action, my name should

body.text:
"[I'm] so full of action, my name should be a verb" -- Big Daddy Kane ("Raw", 1987)
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: (On the back of a VW Beetle) Don't honk,

body.text:
(On the back of a VW Beetle) Don't honk, I'm peddling as fast as I can.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

:(){ :|:&};: # DANGER: DO NOT run this, unless you REALLY know what you're doing!

meta.title: A Life? Cool! Where can I download one of

body.text:
A Life? Cool! Where can I download one of those from?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A Nobel Peace Prize? I would KILL for one

body.text:
A Nobel Peace Prize? I would KILL for one of those.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A bird in the hand is safer than one

body.text:
A bird in the hand is safer than one overhead.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A cat has claws ending its paws. A

body.text:
A cat has claws ending its paws. A sentence has a pause ending its clause.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A city is a large community where people

body.text:
A city is a large community where people are lonesome together.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A computer program does what you tell it

body.text:
A computer program does what you tell it to do, not what you want it to do.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A computer without Microsoft is like a

body.text:
A computer without Microsoft is like a chocolate cake without mustard.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A conclusion is simply the place where

body.text:
A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A conscience does not prevent sin. It

body.text:
A conscience does not prevent sin. It only prevents you from enjoying it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A diplomat thinks twice before saying

body.text:
A diplomat thinks twice before saying nothing.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A facility for quotation covers the

body.text:
A facility for quotation covers the absence of original thought.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A fanatic is one who can't change his

body.text:
A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A fine is a tax for doing wrong. A tax is

body.text:
A fine is a tax for doing wrong. A tax is a fine for doing well.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A good programmer is someone who looks

body.text:
A good programmer is someone who looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A language is a dialect with an army.

body.text:
A language is a dialect with an army.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A man is incomplete until he is married.

body.text:
A man is incomplete until he is married. After that, he is finished.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A man with a watch knows what time it is.

body.text:
A man with a watch knows what time it is. A man with two watches is never sure.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A messy desk is a sign of a messy mind.

body.text:
A messy desk is a sign of a messy mind. An empty desk is a sign of an empty mind.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A professor is one who talks in someone

body.text:
A professor is one who talks in someone else's sleep.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A smart man always covers his ass. A wise

body.text:
A smart man always covers his ass. A wise man just keeps his pants on.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: A thing is not necessarily true because a

body.text:
A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it. - Oscar Wilde
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: AAAAA: the American Association for the

body.text:
AAAAA: the American Association for the Abolition of Abbreviations and Acronyms
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: AlGoreithm, n: Repeating a calculation

body.text:
AlGoreithm, n: Repeating a calculation until a prior desired result is produced.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Alarm clock: A device to wake people

body.text:
Alarm clock: A device to wake people without small kids.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: All those who believe in psychokinesis,

body.text:
All those who believe in psychokinesis, raise my hand.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Always borrow money from pessimists. They

body.text:
Always borrow money from pessimists. They don't expect to be paid back.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Always go to other people's funerals,

body.text:
Always go to other people's funerals, otherwise they won't come to yours.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Always keep your words soft and sweet,

body.text:
Always keep your words soft and sweet, just in case you have to eat them.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Always remember you're unique, just like

body.text:
Always remember you're unique, just like everyone else.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: An Apple a day, keeps Windows away.

body.text:
An Apple a day, keeps Windows away.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: An apple a day keeps the doctor away. An

body.text:
An apple a day keeps the doctor away. An onion a day keeps everyone away!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: An egotist is a person of low taste, more

body.text:
An egotist is a person of low taste, more interested in himself than in me.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: An error? Impossible! My modem is error

body.text:
An error? Impossible! My modem is error correcting.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: And now for some feedback:

body.text:
And now for some feedback: EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Anyone who quotes me in their sig is an

body.text:
Anyone who quotes me in their sig is an idiot. -- Rusty Russell's sig.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Are you still here? The message is over.

body.text:
Are you still here? The message is over. Shoo! Go away!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: As every cat owner knows, nobody owns a

body.text:
As every cat owner knows, nobody owns a cat.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: As far as we know, our computer has never

body.text:
As far as we know, our computer has never had an undetected error.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Attention: There will be a rain dance

body.text:
Attention: There will be a rain dance Friday night, weather permitting.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Bank, n: a place that will lend you money

body.text:
Bank, n: a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Bigamy: Having one wife too many.

body.text:
Bigamy: Having one wife too many. Monogamy: The same thing!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Birthdays are good for you - the more you

body.text:
Birthdays are good for you - the more you have the longer you live.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Boat: A hole in the water surrounded by

body.text:
Boat: A hole in the water surrounded by wood into which one pours money.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Bore, n.: A person who talks when you

body.text:
Bore, n.: A person who talks when you wish him to listen.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Bumper sticker on stealth bomber: "If you

body.text:
Bumper sticker on stealth bomber: "If you can read this, we wasted a lot of money!"
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Bureaucracy, n: A method for transforming

body.text:
Bureaucracy, n: A method for transforming energy into solid waste.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Business jargon is the art of saying

body.text:
Business jargon is the art of saying nothing while appearing to say a lot.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Cat rule #2: Bite the hand that won't

body.text:
Cat rule #2: Bite the hand that won't feed you fast enough.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Cats are smarter than dogs. You can't get

body.text:
Cats are smarter than dogs. You can't get eight cats to pull a sled through snow.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Cats aren't clean, they're just covered

body.text:
Cats aren't clean, they're just covered with cat spit.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Cats know what we feel. They don't care,

body.text:
Cats know what we feel. They don't care, but they know.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Cement mixer collided with a prison van.

body.text:
Cement mixer collided with a prison van. Look out for sixteen hardened criminals.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Christopher Robin Hood steals from the

body.text:
Christopher Robin Hood steals from the rich and gives to the Pooh.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Cigarette: tobacco wrapped in paper, fire

body.text:
Cigarette: tobacco wrapped in paper, fire at one end, and a fool at the other.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Committee: A group of people that keeps

body.text:
Committee: A group of people that keeps minutes and wastes hours.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Communism is the equal distribution of

body.text:
Communism is the equal distribution of poverty.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Computers are like air conditioners. Both

body.text:
Computers are like air conditioners. Both stop working if you open windows.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Corduroy pillows - they're making

body.text:
Corduroy pillows - they're making headlines!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Creativity consists of coming up with

body.text:
Creativity consists of coming up with many ideas, not just that one great idea.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Deja Moo: The feeling that you've heard

body.text:
Deja Moo: The feeling that you've heard this bull before.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Despite the cost of living, have you

body.text:
Despite the cost of living, have you noticed how it remains so popular?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Diplomat: A man who always remembers a

body.text:
Diplomat: A man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never her age.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Disclaimer: The opinions expressed above

body.text:
Disclaimer: The opinions expressed above are not my own.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Does replacing myself with a shell-script

body.text:
Does replacing myself with a shell-script make me impressive or insignificant?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Don't be irreplaceable. If you can't be

body.text:
Don't be irreplaceable. If you can't be replaced, you can't be promoted.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Drink varnish and you'll get a lovely

body.text:
Drink varnish and you'll get a lovely finish.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Early bird gets the worm, but the second

body.text:
Early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Earth First! We can strip-mine the other

body.text:
Earth First! We can strip-mine the other planets later...
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Energizer Bunny arrested - charged with

body.text:
Energizer Bunny arrested - charged with battery.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Enjoy the new millennium; it might be

body.text:
Enjoy the new millennium; it might be your last.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Entropy: Not just a fad, it's the future!

body.text:
Entropy: Not just a fad, it's the future!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Everybody lies, but it doesn't matter

body.text:
Everybody lies, but it doesn't matter since nobody listens.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Experience is what causes a person to

body.text:
Experience is what causes a person to make new mistakes instead of old ones.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Experience is what lets you recognize a

body.text:
Experience is what lets you recognize a mistake when you make it again.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Fame: when your name is in everything but

body.text:
Fame: when your name is in everything but the phone book.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
For people who like peace and quiet - a phoneless cord.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
From the Linux getopt(3) manpage: "BUGS: This manpage is confusing."

meta.title: Give Yogi a rifle. Support your right to

body.text:
Give Yogi a rifle. Support your right to arm bears!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: God created the world out of nothing, but

body.text:
God created the world out of nothing, but the nothingness still shows through.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Guarantee: this email is 100% free of

body.text:
Guarantee: this email is 100% free of magnetic monopoles, or your money back!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Happiness isn't getting what you want,

body.text:
Happiness isn't getting what you want, it's wanting what you've got.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Hardware, n.: The parts of a computer

body.text:
Hardware, n.: The parts of a computer system that can be kicked.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Having a smoking section in a restaurant

body.text:
Having a smoking section in a restaurant is like having a peeing section in a pool
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: He who dies with the most toys is still

body.text:
He who dies with the most toys is still dead -- Citibank billboard, Manhattan 2001
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: He who has more is not happier than he

body.text:
He who has more is not happier than he who wants less.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Help Microsoft stamp out piracy. Give

body.text:
Help Microsoft stamp out piracy. Give Linux to a friend today!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Help Wanted: Telepath. You know where to apply.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Hi! I'm a signature virus! Copy me into

body.text:
Hi! I'm a signature virus! Copy me into your signature to help me spread!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Hindsight is always 20:20

body.text:
Hindsight is always 20:20
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Hospital: Where they wake you up to give

body.text:
Hospital: Where they wake you up to give you a sleeping pill.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Hospitality: Making your guests feel at

body.text:
Hospitality: Making your guests feel at home, even if you wish they were.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: How do you tell when a pineapple is ready

body.text:
How do you tell when a pineapple is ready to eat? It picks up its knife and fork
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: How long a minute depends on what side of

body.text:
How long a minute depends on what side of the bathroom door you're on.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if

body.text:
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck would chuck wood?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: How to become immortal: Read this

body.text:
How to become immortal: Read this signature tomorrow and follow its advice.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: How's he gonna read that magazine rolled

body.text:
How's he gonna read that magazine rolled up like that? What the ... - a fly.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I am logged in, therefore I am.

body.text:
I am logged in, therefore I am.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I am the world's greatest authority on my

body.text:
I am the world's greatest authority on my own opinion.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I am thinking about a new signature. Stay

body.text:
I am thinking about a new signature. Stay tuned.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I before E except after C. We live in a

body.text:
I before E except after C. We live in a weird society!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I considered atheism but there weren't

body.text:
I considered atheism but there weren't enough holidays.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I couldn't afford a cool signature, so I

body.text:
I couldn't afford a cool signature, so I just got this one.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I couldn't think of an interesting

body.text:
I couldn't think of an interesting signature to put here... Maybe next time.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I don't eat snails. I prefer fast food.

body.text:
I don't eat snails. I prefer fast food.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I don't live on the edge, but sometimes I

body.text:
I don't live on the edge, but sometimes I go there to visit.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I don't suffer from insanity, I enjoy

body.text:
I don't suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute of it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I had a lovely evening. Unfortunately,

body.text:
I had a lovely evening. Unfortunately, this wasn't it. - Groucho Marx
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I have a great signature, but it won't

body.text:
I have a great signature, but it won't fit at the end of this message -- Fermat
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I have a watch cat! If someone breaks in,

body.text:
I have a watch cat! If someone breaks in, she'll watch.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I have an open mind - it's just closed

body.text:
I have an open mind - it's just closed for repairs.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I intend to live forever - so far, so

body.text:
I intend to live forever - so far, so good.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I love deadlines. I love the whooshing

body.text:
I love deadlines. I love the whooshing sound they make as they go by.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I planted some bird seed. A bird came up.

body.text:
I planted some bird seed. A bird came up. Now I don't know what to feed it...
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I put a dollar in one of those change

body.text:
I put a dollar in one of those change machines. Nothing changed.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I started out with nothing... I still

body.text:
I started out with nothing... I still have most of it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I used to be a lumberjack, but I just

body.text:
I used to be a lumberjack, but I just couldn't hack it, so they gave me the axe.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I used to work in a pickle factory, until

body.text:
I used to work in a pickle factory, until I got canned.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I want to be a human being, not a human

body.text:
I want to be a human being, not a human doing -- Scatman John
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I want to live forever or die in the

body.text:
I want to live forever or die in the attempt.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I work for money. If you want loyalty,

body.text:
I work for money. If you want loyalty, buy yourself a dog.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I would give my right arm to be

body.text:
I would give my right arm to be ambidextrous.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: I'm a peripheral visionary: I see into

body.text:
I'm a peripheral visionary: I see into the future, but mostly off to the sides.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If God had intended us to be vegetarians,

body.text:
If God had intended us to be vegetarians, He wouldn't have made animals out of meat
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If God is watching us, the least we can

body.text:
If God is watching us, the least we can do is be entertaining.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If I am not for myself, who will be for

body.text:
If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am only for myself, who am I?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing

body.text:
If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?.... Abraham Lincoln
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If Windows is the answer, you didn't

body.text:
If Windows is the answer, you didn't understand the question.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If a million Shakespeares tried to write

body.text:
If a million Shakespeares tried to write together, they would write like a monkey.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If at first you don't succeed, skydiving

body.text:
If at first you don't succeed, skydiving is not for you.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If con is the opposite of pro, is

body.text:
If con is the opposite of pro, is congress the opposite of progress?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If glory comes after death, I'm not in a

body.text:
If glory comes after death, I'm not in a hurry. (Latin proverb)
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If marriage was illegal, only outlaws

body.text:
If marriage was illegal, only outlaws would have in-laws.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If the universe is expanding, why can't I

body.text:
If the universe is expanding, why can't I find a parking space?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If you choke a Smurf, what color does it

body.text:
If you choke a Smurf, what color does it turn?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If you drink, don't park; Accidents cause

body.text:
If you drink, don't park; Accidents cause people.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If you lost your left arm, your right arm

body.text:
If you lost your left arm, your right arm would be left.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If you tell the truth, you don't have to

body.text:
If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: If you're looking for a helping hand,

body.text:
If you're looking for a helping hand, look first at the end of your arm.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: In Fortran, God is real unless declared

body.text:
In Fortran, God is real unless declared an integer.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: In God we Trust -- all others must submit

body.text:
In God we Trust -- all others must submit an X.509 certificate.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: In case of emergency, this box may be

body.text:
In case of emergency, this box may be used as a quotation device.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Isn't Disney World a people trap operated

body.text:
Isn't Disney World a people trap operated by a mouse?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: It is better to be thought a fool, then

body.text:
It is better to be thought a fool, then to open your mouth and remove all doubt.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: It's fortunate I have bad luck - without

body.text:
It's fortunate I have bad luck - without it I would have no luck at all!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: It's hard to fly like an eagle when

body.text:
It's hard to fly like an eagle when you're surrounded by turkeys.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Jury: Twelve people who determine which

body.text:
Jury: Twelve people who determine which client has the better lawyer.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Just remember that if the world didn't

body.text:
Just remember that if the world didn't suck, we would all fall off.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Learn from mistakes of others; you won't

body.text:
Learn from mistakes of others; you won't live long enough to make them all yourself
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Life can only be understood backwards but

body.text:
Life can only be understood backwards but it must be lived forwards.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Life is what happens to you while you're

body.text:
Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Life's a bitch, but god forbid the bitch

body.text:
Life's a bitch, but god forbid the bitch divorce me -- Nas
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Linux *is* user-friendly. Not

body.text:
Linux *is* user-friendly. Not idiot-friendly, but user-friendly.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Linux is just like a wigwam: no Windows,

body.text:
Linux is just like a wigwam: no Windows, no Gates and an Apache inside.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Linux: Because rebooting is for adding

body.text:
Linux: Because rebooting is for adding new hardware.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Live as if you were to die tomorrow,

body.text:
Live as if you were to die tomorrow, learn as if you were to live forever.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Long periods of drought are always

body.text:
Long periods of drought are always followed by rain.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at

body.text:
Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Lumber Cartel member #2224.

body.text:
Lumber Cartel member #2224. http://lumbercartel.freeyellow.com/
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Make it idiot proof and someone will make

body.text:
Make it idiot proof and someone will make a better idiot.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Martin Luther King said "I have a dream",

body.text:
Martin Luther King said "I have a dream", not "I have a plan".
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: May you live as long as you want - and

body.text:
May you live as long as you want - and never want as long as you live.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Microchips: what's left at the bottom of

body.text:
Microchips: what's left at the bottom of the bag when it reaches you.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Ms Piggy's last words: "I'm pink,

body.text:
Ms Piggy's last words: "I'm pink, therefore I'm ham."
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: My greatest fear is that no-one will

body.text:
My greatest fear is that no-one will remember me after I'm dead - some dead guy
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: My password is my dog's name. His name is

body.text:
My password is my dog's name. His name is a#j!4@h, but I change it every month.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: My typos are intentional copyright traps.

body.text:
My typos are intentional copyright traps.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: New! Divorcee Barbie! Comes with all the

body.text:
New! Divorcee Barbie! Comes with all the usual accessories, plus all of Ken's stuff
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Only dead fish go with the flow.

body.text:
Only dead fish go with the flow.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Open your arms to change, but don't let

body.text:
Open your arms to change, but don't let go of your values.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Politics, n: from Greek, "poly"=many,

body.text:
Politics, n: from Greek, "poly"=many, "ticks"=blood sucking parasites.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Promises are like babies: fun to make,

body.text:
Promises are like babies: fun to make, but hell to deliver.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Quitters never win. Winners never quit.

body.text:
Quitters never win. Winners never quit. Idiots never win BUT STILL never quit.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Recursive, adj.: See Recursive
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Red meat is not bad for you: fuzzy green meat is bad for you.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Seen on a sign outside a church: "This is a C H _ _ C H ... what's missing?"

body.text:
Seen on the back of a dump truck: <---PASSING SIDE . . . . . SUICIDE--->
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Share your knowledge. It's a way to

body.text:
Share your knowledge. It's a way to achieve immortality.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Shortening Year-2000 to Y2K was just the kind of thinking that caused that problem!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Sign above a shop selling burglar alarms: "For the man who has everything"
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Sign in pool: "Welcome to our OOL. Notice there is no P, please keep it that way."
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Sign in zoo: Do not feed the animals. If

body.text:
Sign in zoo: Do not feed the animals. If you have food give it to the guard on duty
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Sign on a back of truck: "Overtakers

body.text:
Sign on a back of truck: "Overtakers beware, or you might meet the Undertaker"
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

body.text:
Sign seen in restaurant: We Reserve The Right To Serve Refuse To Anyone!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Snowflakes are very fragile, but look

body.text:
Snowflakes are very fragile, but look what they can do when they stick together!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Software is like sex, it is better when

body.text:
Software is like sex, it is better when it's free -- Linus Torvalds
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Some people bring happiness wherever they

body.text:
Some people bring happiness wherever they go, others whenever they go.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Someone offered you a cute little quote

body.text:
Someone offered you a cute little quote for your signature? JUST SAY NO!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Sorry, but my karma just ran over your

body.text:
Sorry, but my karma just ran over your dogma.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Spelling mistakes left in for people who

body.text:
Spelling mistakes left in for people who feel the need to correct others.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Strike not only while the iron is hot,

body.text:
Strike not only while the iron is hot, make the iron hot by striking it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Support bacteria - they're the only

body.text:
Support bacteria - they're the only culture some people have!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Tact is the art of making a point without

body.text:
Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Tact: The ability to describe others as

body.text:
Tact: The ability to describe others as they see themselves. - Abraham Lincoln
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Take my advice, I don't use it anyway.

body.text:
Take my advice, I don't use it anyway.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Tea or coffee? Coffee, without cream. It

body.text:
Tea or coffee? Coffee, without cream. It will be without milk, we have no cream.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The 3 stages of sex: Tri-weekly, try

body.text:
The 3 stages of sex: Tri-weekly, try weekly, try weakly.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The fact that no one understands you

body.text:
The fact that no one understands you doesn't mean you're an artist.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The human mind is like a parachute - it

body.text:
The human mind is like a parachute - it functions better when it is open.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The knowledge that you are an idiot, is

body.text:
The knowledge that you are an idiot, is what distinguishes you from one.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The meek shall inherit the Earth, for

body.text:
The meek shall inherit the Earth, for they are too timid to refuse it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The message above is just this

body.text:
The message above is just this signature's way of propagating itself.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The path of least resistance is what

body.text:
The path of least resistance is what makes rivers and politicians crooked.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The person who knows how to laugh at

body.text:
The person who knows how to laugh at himself will never cease to be amused.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The road to good intentions is paved with

body.text:
The road to good intentions is paved with hell.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The socks in my drawer are like

body.text:
The socks in my drawer are like snowflakes: No two are alike.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The space between my ears was

body.text:
The space between my ears was intentionally left blank.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The trouble with being punctual is that

body.text:
The trouble with being punctual is that nobody is there to appreciate it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The trouble with political jokes is they

body.text:
The trouble with political jokes is they get elected.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The two most common elements in the

body.text:
The two most common elements in the universe are hydrogen and stupidity.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The two rules for success are: 1. Never

body.text:
The two rules for success are: 1. Never tell them everything you know.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: The world is coming to an end ... SAVE

body.text:
The world is coming to an end ... SAVE YOUR BUFFERS!!!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: There are 2 ways to do it - my way and

body.text:
There are 2 ways to do it - my way and the right way
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: This '|' is not a pipe.

body.text:
This '|' is not a pipe.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: This box was intentionally left blank.

body.text:
This box was intentionally left blank.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: This message contains 100% recycled

body.text:
This message contains 100% recycled characters.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: This signature was intentionally left

body.text:
This signature was intentionally left boring.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: This space is for sale - inquire inside.

body.text:
This space is for sale - inquire inside.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Those are my principles. If you don't

body.text:
Those are my principles. If you don't like them, I have others.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Those who beat their swords into

body.text:
Those who beat their swords into plowshares will plow for those who don't.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Thousands of years ago, cats were

body.text:
Thousands of years ago, cats were worshipped as gods. They never forgot.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Time is the best teacher. Unfortunately

body.text:
Time is the best teacher. Unfortunately it kills all its students.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: To decide or not to decide, that is the

body.text:
To decide or not to decide, that is the question. Or is it?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Today is the tomorrow you worried about

body.text:
Today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday, and now you know why.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Topologist, n.: A person who cannot tell

body.text:
Topologist, n.: A person who cannot tell a doughnut from a coffee mug.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Tourist: Someone who goes 3,000 miles to

body.text:
Tourist: Someone who goes 3,000 miles to get a picture in front of his car.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Two wrongs may not may a right, but three

body.text:
Two wrongs may not may a right, but three rights make a left.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Unix is simple, but it takes a genius to

body.text:
Unix is simple, but it takes a genius to understand its simplicity.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Unix is user friendly - it's just picky

body.text:
Unix is user friendly - it's just picky about its friends.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Unlike Microsoft, a restaurant will not

body.text:
Unlike Microsoft, a restaurant will not ask me to pay for food with a bug in it!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: War doesn't determine who's right but

body.text:
War doesn't determine who's right but who's left.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Ways to Relieve Stress #10: Make up a

body.text:
Ways to Relieve Stress #10: Make up a language and ask people for directions.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: We aim to please, you aim too, please.

body.text:
We aim to please, you aim too, please. (sign in a gas station men's room)
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: We are Microsoft. You will be

body.text:
We are Microsoft. You will be assimilated. Resistance is futile.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: We could wipe out world hunger if we knew

body.text:
We could wipe out world hunger if we knew how to make AOL's Free CD's edible!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Wear short sleeves! Support your right to

body.text:
Wear short sleeves! Support your right to bare arms!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Welcome to the Church of the Holy

body.text:
Welcome to the Church of the Holy Cabbage. Lettuce pray...
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: What did the Buddhist say to the hot dog

body.text:
What did the Buddhist say to the hot dog vendor? Make me one with everything.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: What's the difference between roast beef

body.text:
What's the difference between roast beef and pea soup? Anyone can roast beef.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: What's the greatest world-wide use of

body.text:
What's the greatest world-wide use of cowhide? To hold cows together.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: What's tiny, yellow and very dangerous? A

body.text:
What's tiny, yellow and very dangerous? A canary with the super-user password.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: When everything's coming your way, you're

body.text:
When everything's coming your way, you're in the wrong lane.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: When you handle yourself, use your head;
When you lose, don't lose the lesson.

body.text:
When you lose, don't lose the lesson.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Why are you looking down here? The joke

body.text:
Why are you looking down here? The joke is above!
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Why aren't fishmongers generous? Their

body.text:
Why aren't fishmongers generous? Their business makes them selfish.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Why do doctors call what they do

body.text:
Why do doctors call what they do practice? Think about it.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Why do programmers mix up Christmas and

body.text:
Why do programmers mix up Christmas and Halloween? Because DEC 25 = OCT 31
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Why do we drive on a parkway and park on

body.text:
Why do we drive on a parkway and park on a driveway?
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Willpower: The ability to eat only one

body.text:
Willpower: The ability to eat only one salted peanut.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Windows detected you moved your mouse.

body.text:
Windows detected you moved your mouse. Reboot for this change to take effect.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: Windows-2000/Professional isn't.

body.text:
Windows-2000/Professional isn't.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: You do not need a parachute to skydive.

body.text:
You do not need a parachute to skydive. You only need one to skydive twice.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: You have the right to remain silent.

body.text:
You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say will be used against you.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.

meta.title: You may only be one person to the world,

body.text:
You may only be one person to the world, but may also be the world to one person.
-- One of Nadav Har'El's Email Signatures.
